title: Draw for Android Wear
summary: Drawing app for Android Wear. Draw on your Android Wear smartwatch.
description: Made for Android Wear smart watches.  Allows you to draw on your Android Wear Device. Save button allows you to save your own masterpieces.  Android Wear option has 7 colors and 5 brush sizes.
descriptionHTML: Made for Android Wear smart watches.  Allows you to draw on your Android Wear Device. Save button allows you to save your own masterpieces.  Android Wear option has 7 colors and 5 brush sizes.
comments: Not saving It doesnt save it on my gallery, phone sony z1 android 5
Oky Works Oky on my Asus zen watch 2
recentChanges: This application fixes the problem that the app would try to close when drawing left to right.
